alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 7:44PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cheyenne and southwestern Morrill Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 644 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Gurley, or 11 miles north of Sidney, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 30 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dalton and Gurley. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
